TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MetadataReaderProvider extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class MetadataReaderProvider Implements IDisposable
public ref class MetadataReaderProvider sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 为存储在字节数组、内存块或流中的元数据提供 。

span.span: Provides a for metadata stored in an array of bytes, a memory block, or a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MetadataReaderProvider` 支持以下格式：`MetadataReaderProvider` supports the following formats: - ECMA-335 CLI （公共语言基础结构）元数据（）。ECMA-335 CLI (Common Language Infrastructure) metadata (). - 编辑并继续元数据增量（）。Edit and Continue metadata delta (). - 可移植 PDB 元数据（）。Portable PDB metadata ().

Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由读取器分配的所有内存。

span.span: Disposes all memory allocated by the reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以多次调用 （但不并行）。 can be called multiple times (but not in parallel). 与 上的任何其他操作或从基础内存中读取时，不安全地调用 。It is not safe to call in parallel with any other operation on the or when reading from the underlying memory.

summary.span: 基于内存中存储的映像创建元数据提供程序。

span.span: Creates a metadata provider over an image stored in memory.
The new metadata provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内存由调用方拥有，不会释放 。The memory is owned by the caller and is not released on disposal of the . 调用方负责使内存保持活动状态，并在 的整个生存期内不进行修改。The caller is responsible for keeping the memory alive and unmodified throughout the lifetime of the . 在 的构造过程中不读取 blob 的内容。The content of the blob is not read during the construction of the .

is negative.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReaderProvider FromMetadataStream (System.IO.Stream stream, System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataStreamOptions options = System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataStreamOptions.Default, int size = 0);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReaderProvider FromMetadataStream(class System.IO.Stream stream, valuetype System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataStreamOptions options, int32 size) cil managed
static member FromMetadataStream : System.IO.Stream * System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataStreamOptions * int -> System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReaderProvider

span.span: A instance.

param.name: options
param.span: 用于指定如何从流中读取映像分区的选项。

span.span: Options specifying how sections of the image are read from the stream.

param.name: size
param.span: 流中的元数据 blob 大小。

span.span: Size of the metadata blob in the stream.

param.span: 如果未指定，则假定元数据 blob 横跨到流的结尾。

span.span: If not specified, the metadata blob is assumed to span to the end of the stream.

summary.span: 为具有指定大小且从其当前位置开头的流创建提供程序。

span.span: Creates a provider for a stream of the specified size beginning at its current position.
The new provider.

remarks.format: 除非指定 ，否则，在成功参数验证后，流的所有权将转移到 。Unless is specified, ownership of the stream is transferred to the upon successful argument validation. 它将被 释放，并且调用方不能对其进行操作。It will be disposed by the , and the caller must not manipulate it. 除非指定 ，否则在构造 时，不会从流中读取任何数据。Unless is specified, no data is read from the stream during construction of the . 此外，当 处于活动状态且未释放时，不能由调用方对流进行操作。Furthermore, the stream must not be manipulated by caller while the is alive and undisposed. 如果 ，则 将读取在构造过程中请求的所有数据。If , the will have read all of the data requested during construction. 同样，如果同时指定了 ，则调用方将保留流的完全所有权，并确保 构造后不会对其进行操作。As such, if is also specified, the caller retains full ownership of the stream and is assured that it will not be manipulated by the after construction.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不支持读取和查找操作。

span.span: doesn't support read and seek operations.

exception.span: 大小为负，或者扩展超出了流的末尾。

span.span: Size is negative or extends past the end of the stream.

exception.span: 从流中读取时出错（仅在指定 时读取）。

span.span: Error reading from the stream (only when is specified).

Gets a from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方必须在元数据读取器的整个生存期内保留 未释放。The caller must keep the undisposed throughout the lifetime of the metadata reader. 如果多次调用此方法，则每个具有与传递到上一个成功调用的参数相等的参数的调用将返回与上一个调用相同的 实例。If this method is called multiple times, each call with arguments equal to the arguments passed to the previous successful call returns the same instance of as the previous call.

span.span: The encoding of is not .
The current platform is big-endian.

span.span: IO error while reading from the underlying stream.
Provider has been disposed.
